/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the grandeur and scale of the cityscape. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades adorned with colorful graffiti, adding a vibrant touch to the urban environment. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, indicating a well-organized traffic system. Trees and lampposts punctuate the scene, providing a sense of order amidst the city's hustle and bustle. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
